Title: Advancing mainframe modernization with Slingshot and Microsoft | ODSP1409
Description:
Learn how a major US health company conquered legacy tech debt with Publicis Sapient. This session details an AI-powered modernization effort that transformed thousands of COBOL screens and utilized Microsoft's Azure cloud platform and Sapient Slingshot, resulting in a 3x faster migration and improved overall efficiency.
